data.title: Clone Army
data.description: Want to be a commander of clone army? double your troops, to beat the enemies!
data.mission: Your are a scientist in charge of producing clone army to defense your world. Your enemy is overwhelming, you need to double your army!
data.coding: Write an expression or a formular to double the 'troops_amount' value above.

data.title: Lava Adventure
data.description: The goal in this mission is learning how to organize different actions to get through the lava valley.
data.mission: Ola is being trapped in the lava valley! Your mission is to help him out of there!
data.tips: Compose a group of actions to instruct Ola walking through it. ONE line ONE action only, available actions including:

data.title: Make your Bridge
data.description: A bridge in air missing odd number blocks, make up for it to pass safely!
data.mission: Ola needs to reach the door across the broken bridge, help him repair the bridge!
data.tips: in bridge stone list, 1 repesents existing conrnerstone, 0 repesents blank space. So, when all the 0 change to 1, you would pass!
data.coding: Change odd elements of the list to 1
data.walk: Now, press right arrow key to move player

data.title: Guess My First Name
data.description: Gate keeper need someone to answer his question to let him go, so what is his first name?
data.mission: The first three letter of his name covered, using string index method to extract it.

data.title: Riddle of Sphinx
data.description: Reproduce the famous riddle to let user choose right answer, True or False.
data.mission: make two box holding the right and wrong anser, using if statement to check key word(a person)!

data.title: Which way to go
data.description: Make a path including dividing forks which need to check which way to go!
data.mission: check color, check direction, check target...to reach the exit.

data.title: Fly them up
data.description: Your troops are being trapped in toxic valley, you need to dispatch flying armor for each of them to get out of there!
data.mission: you are a smart commander & scientist, you need to use `for` loop to equip armor with each soldier

data.title: Across live bridge
data.description: You are running into a weird bridge with disorderd pillars, you need to reorder them with correct order to get across!
data.mission: The bridge is alive because its pillars constantly changing, until you reorder it acscendingly then descendingly you would make it stable.

data.title: Fix the clock
data.description: To pass the first checkpoint of this adventure, you need to fix the clock to enter next chapter of this game.
data.mission: Use time function to return the current time, you will make it works! not tough right?
